home.title: Hi, I‚Äôm Don Freddy
home.subtitle: I work as a software engineer from Douala, Cameroon. I specialize in building web and mobile applications and sites using Javascript, Vue & Node. I've procrastinated building this website for years but finally it's here, I've carved out my own little nook on the internet to share my silly experiments, nifty projects, and thoughts (mostly about tech).
home.subtitle2: By day, I'm a Fullstack Developer at Company, and by night (and weekends), I'm busy tinkering with some random tool or app that I am building
